name: ardiffact
description: plugin based tool for diffing artifacts
author: Larry Kiniu <lkiniu@microsoft.com>

scripts.gen-docs: lage docs --no-cache && api-documenter markdown --input api/temp --output docs
scripts.clean: npx -q rimraf node_modules api packages/*/node_modules packages/*/lib packages/*/dist packages/*/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
